name: The North Face Cypress Jacket - Men's
description:
An everyday jacket with mountain-worthy construction. This waterproof shell uses reliable waterproof fabric with a comfortable liner, to keep you dry on urban outings or day hikes. With roomy pockets and an adjustable hood, it's the perfect go-to jacket for days around town.2-layer DryVent waterproof material is soft, windproof and breathable.Recycled polyester face fabric is durable with a DWR finish to shed precipitation.Lining is made of recycled polyester to improve wicking and comfort next to skin.YKK Vislon zipper is covered with a storm flap and Velcro® closures.Adjustable hood can be fitted to seal out wind and precipitation.2 zippered hand pockets, 2 flap cargo pockets, and 1 zippered internal chest pocket.Contoured cuffs adjust with Velcro® closures.Standard fit allows room to layer.

        Sustainability
